zygisk.description: ZygiskNext is essential for running Zygisk-based modules on a kernel that supports KernelSU. Install this to use various Zygisk modules efficiently.
zygisk.heading: Setting Up ZygiskNext

zygisk_hider.brief: Module for hiding the traces of Zygisk.
zygisk_hider.description: Use Zygisk Hider to conceal the presence of Zygisk from detection by various apps, ensuring smoother usage without interference.
zygisk_hider.heading: Concealing Zygisk with Zygisk Hider

lsposed.brief: Zygisk module for using LSPosed with KernelSU.
lsposed.description: LSPosed brings Xposed framework functionalities via Zygisk, allowing advanced customizations and modules for your Android device.
lsposed.heading: Enhancing Customization with LSPosed

sharp_plus_plus.brief: Installs the module required to use Sharp++ for AGC-GCAM.
sharp_plus_plus.description: Replaces libraries related to the camera to enable functionalities such as RAW, high-speed, ZSL, front cam and more on C2API.
sharp_plus_plus.heading: Unlock your camera

viper4android_re.brief: Module for using ViPER4Android on your phone.
viper4android_re.description: ViPER4Android provides advanced audio enhancements, enabling users to optimize sound quality on their devices.
viper4android_re.heading: Optimizing Sound with ViPER4Android

youtube_revanced.brief: This module enables you to use YouTube ReVanced.
youtube_revanced.description: YouTube ReVanced offers an ad-free experience, background playback, and more features for an enhanced YouTube experience.
youtube_revanced.heading: Enhance Your YouTube Experience with ReVanced
